summary: Being experienced as an English instructor for 6 years, I have worked for a language school and universities and taught both teenagers and adults in groups or one-on-one. I am passionate about teaching English by using cutting edge language teaching methods. I have also deep know-how on educational technologies. Having not only a diploma on English language teaching but also a Cambridge certificate (CELTA), I have taught English both international and Turkish students. As a teacher, I see myself as a life long learner.
